name: Notion Widget Pack
description: Customize your workspace with these handcrafted Minimalist Notion Widgets. Just copy them to your workspace and start using them!Widgets included:Clock (12-hour format)Clock (24-hour format)QuotesCalendarStopwatch Countdown to New YearPomodoro timerQuestionsHow to download the template?Once you've made the purchase, you'll be redirected to the Notion page. features: Clock (12-hour format); Clock (24-hour format); Countdown to New Year; Pomodoro timer
